Martin just got home from work. Martin comes up behind Rachel and scares her, that would be

Jane has borrowed her mom's car to go shopping, and she notices an empty spot right in front of the store, next to a fire hydrant. Jane parks in front of the fire hydrant and her mom's car ends up getting towed, that would be
Maude's husband Jim recently retired, and she's annoyed at how often he's at home now. Maude finds several ways to get Jim out of the house like golf and random trips with his buddies, that would be
